blocks.name: output
blocks.comment: * This automation requires no configuration. Press "Run". *

inputs.value:
#### Welcome to the Qlik Cloud Capacity installation process!

This installer handles both new installations and upgrades of the Qlik Cloud Monitoring applications.

settings.displayValue: Add this output to the list of all outputs

blocks.name: getCurrentUserId
blocks.displayName: Qlik Cloud Services - Get Current User Id
blocks.comment: Get the current user ID to look up whether they have the TenantAdmin role

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.comment: Look up whether they have the TenantAdmin role

blocks.name: rawAPIRequest
blocks.displayName: Qlik Cloud Services - Raw API Request
blocks.comment: Check if API keys are enabled

blocks.name: condition11
blocks.comment: Are API keys enabled on the tenant?

blocks.name: inputs10
blocks.comment: Should this installer enable API keys on this tenant?

form.label: Should this installer enable API keys on this tenant now?
form.helpText: API keys are not currently enabled on this tenant, which is a prerequisite of the installer. An API key is required to create the data connection to Qlik Cloud that the monitoring applications leverage. If 'No' is selected, this will need to be done manually, and the installer will exit.

conditions.input1: {$.inputs10.'Should this installer enable API keys on this tenant now?'}

form.label: What should the maximum API key expiration be set to in days?
form.helpText: Note that the API key will need to be rotated for the data connection that the monitoring applications use within the timeframe that is set. This can be an automated process, but will need to be run within the window set above.

blocks.name: rawAPIRequest4
blocks.displayName: Qlik Cloud Services - Raw API Request 4

blocks.name: apiKeyExpiry
blocks.comment: Set the expiration of the API keys.

operations.name: Set value of { variable }
operations.value: P{$.inputs17.'What should the maximum API key expiration be set to in days?'}D

value.value: CUSTOM CONNECT TO "provider=QvRestConnector.exe;url=https://{$.tenantURL}/api/v1/data-connections;timeout=30;readwritetimeout=300;method=GET;httpProtocol=1.1;isKeepAlive=true;bodyEncoding=UTF-8;sendExpect100Continue=true;autoDetectResponseType=true;checkResponseTypeOnTestConnection=true;keyGenerationStrategy=0;XMLDTD=0;authSchema=anonymous;serverCertificateValidation=UseTrust;checkCertificateRevocation=false;enableMutualSSL=false;addMissingQueryParametersToFinalRequest=false;queryHeaders=Authorization%2Bearer { $.inputs3.'### Please provide a valid Qlik API Key' };allowWithConnection=true;retryFailedRequest=false;PaginationType=None;allowResponseHeaders=false;allowHttpsOnly=false;"
